senses.sense_definition: The plant Amaranthus blitum, commonly known as purple amaranth.

examples.text: The gardener identified the weed as <w>blite</w> growing among the vegetables.
We found a patch of purple <w>blite</w> near the edge of the field.

senses.sense_definition: Any of various plants in the genus Chenopodium, often called goosefoot.

examples.text: Some species of <w>blite</w> are edible and can be cooked like spinach.
The strawberry <w>blite</w> is known for its distinctive red fruit-like clusters.

senses.sense_definition: Any of various plants in the genus Atriplex, often called saltbush.

examples.text: This species of <w>blite</w> thrives in saline soils near the coast.
Botanists study <w>blite</w> to understand its adaptation to harsh environments.
